### 2. `mcp.json`

```json

    "demo-mcp": {
      "command": "uv",
      "args": ["run", "main.py"],

```
**⚠️ Issue:** Contains an absolute path (`/Users/sukumarp/...`) which won't work for other developers. Consider using a relative path or environment variable.
